怳字的基本解释

怳
huǎng
古同“恍”。

怳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huǎng］
［《廣韻》許昉切，上養，曉。］
(1)心神不定貌；失意貌。
(2)迷离恍惚；模糊不清。
(3)忽然。
(4)惊貌。
(5)狂貌。参见“怳怳”。

怳字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　怳； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页382第23
【廣韻】許方切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】詡往切，?音?。【說文】狂之貌。　又怳然，自失也。【楚辭·九歌】臨風怳兮浩歌。【朱註】怳，失意貌。　又【集韻】虎晃切。與恍通。【老子·道德經】道之爲物，惟怳惟忽。亦書作恍。言沖漠難狀也。　又【集韻】吁請切。【博雅】狂也。　【說文》長箋】況與怳同。諧兄聲。《說文》謂況省聲，贅矣。楚辭，怳忽兮遙望。改作恍、慌，?俗。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huǎng］
["Guangyun" Xu Fangqie, Shangyang, Xiao. ]
(1) Uncertainty; frustrated appearance.
(2) Blurred and trance; fuzzy.
(3) Suddenly.
(4) Shocking appearance.
(5) Crazy appearance. See "Retreat".
indistinct
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　恍; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 382 23
[Guangyun] Xu Fangqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Cut forward, "yin". [Said the text] Crazy appearance.　 Suddenly again, self-defeating. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Songs] Linfeng feels like a hao song. [Zhu Note] Suddenly, frustrated appearance.　[Jiyun] Tiger Huang cuts. Connect with the shock. [Laozi·Tao De Jing] Dao is a thing, but it's nothing but negligence. Also book as a reminder. Yan Chong is also indifferent.　 [Ji Yun] Call for cutting. [Bo Ya] Crazy too.　【Shuowen" Long Annotation】The situation is the same as that of Yun. Harmonious brother. "Shuowen" says that the situation is not sound, and it is redundant. The Songs of Chu suddenly looked into the distance. Change it to trance, panic, and vulgarity.

huǎng
гл.
1) быть обескураженным, растеряться, паниковать; быть в отчаянии; обескураженный, разочарованный
怳然 в испуге; в панике, обескураженно
2) быть смутным, неясным
怳惑 питать неясные сомнения
